title: How to Make Fizzy Salts

steps.headline: Mix the Epsom salts, sea salt and baking soda together well.
Add a few drops of food color for desired color.
Add 1 tablespoon of skin safe fragrance oil.
Use a funnel to pour the fizzy salts mixture in a jar or container.
Seal the jar or container.
steps.description: Decorate as desired. If giving away as a gift, add a label explaining what they are and how to use them. Use in warm water to get the maximum fizz.

tyn: Storage jar, bottle or container with airtight lid/seal
text: Mix the Epsom salts, sea salt and baking soda together well.  Add a few drops of food color for desired color. Mix well. Add 1 tablespoon of skin safe fragrance oil. Mix well. Add 1/2 cup of citric acid. Mix well. Use a funnel to pour the fizzy salts mixture in a jar or container.  Seal the jar or container. Decorate as desired. If giving away as a gift, add a label explaining what they are and how to use them. Use in warm water to get the maximum fizz.
